task.title: Input Text with IPA Map
task.shortdesc: Create or modify phonetic transcriptions using the IPA Map.

context.p: The IPA Map can be used in any text-input field in Phon.

step.cmd: Place the cursor in a text-input field and select the Tools IPA Map (CMD/CTRL+M) menu item.
step.stepresult: This will generate a window containing the IPA Map.

step.cmd: Click on the buttons in the IPA Map which correspond to the characters you would like to enter into the text-input field.
step.stepresult: The data in the text-input field will reflect your selections.While the IPA Map is open, you may still proceed to type normally.

step.cmd: To close the IPA Map, select the Tools IPA Map (CMD/CTRL+M) menu item.
